original_text: Your children will be shepherds in the desert for 40 years. Because you did not trust me, your children will have trouble. That will continue until all your dead bodies are lying in the desert.
korean_text: 너희의 자녀들은 너희 반역한 죄를 지고 너희의 시체가 광야에서 소멸되기까지 사십 년을 광야에서 방황하는 자가 되리라

sentences.original_text: Your children will be shepherds in the desert
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 자녀들은 광야에서 목자가 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: Because you did not trust me
until all your dead bodies are lying in the desert
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모든 죽은 시체가 광야에 누워 있을 때까지
